ol.li: Select the splunk deployment type and specify the variable monitoring_stack in group_vars/vars
If you choose 'splunk', specify the list of indexers using the variable splunk_architecture_forward_servers in group_vars/vars

if you choose 'splunk and if you want to use your own certificates to secure the communications between the indexers and the universal forwaders
define the variable splunk_ssl in group_vars/vars
put your root CA certificate and your server certificate files in /root/Docker-Synergy/ops/files/splunk/linux/SPLUNK_HOME/etc/mycerts. For more information, refer to the section discussing SSL later in this document.
edit the file server.conf in /files/splunk/linux/SPLUNK_HOME/etc/system/local. Uncomment the [sslConfig] stanza and its content
[sslConfig] sslRootCAPath = /opt/splunkforwarder/etc/mycerts/ca.pem

Copy the Splunk Universal forwarder packages. The solution currently supports the Linux 64-bit and the Windows 8.1/Windows 10 64-bit forwarders.
Open https://www.splunk.com/en_us/download/universal-forwarder.html
Download the MSI package for Windows 64 bit and store it in files/splunk/windows
Download the RPM package for Linux 64-bit (2.6+ kernel Linux distributions) and store it in files/splunk/linux Both images/packages must be at the same version, and have the same name, but they should keep their respective extension, .rpm for linux .msi for windows. For example you will have the following files
files/splunk/windows/splunkforwarder-7.0.2.msi
files/splunk/linux/splunkforwarder-7.0.2.rpm
Edit the vars.yml files located in templates\monitoring\<monitoring_stack>, where <monitoring_stack> is splunk or splunk_demo and set the variable splunk_architecture_universal_forwarder_package to the name you selected for the package(s), not including the file extension.
splunk_architecture_universal_forwarder_package: 'splunkforwarder-7.0.2'

Optionnally (advanced), make adjustements in the following folder hierarchies. The files located here will be copied as-is to the systems running the universal forwarder
files/splunk/linux/SPLUNK_HOME
files/splunk/linux/DOCKER_TAS
files/splunk/windows/SPLUNK_HOME
